storyInfo: In the underground hideout, Siege's team has an argument over their future direction. Amiya and the Doctor manage to persuade Clovisia, forging a partnership between Rhodes Island and the Self-Salvation Corps.

attributes.content: Burn this view of the city into your memories.
Every time a new skyscraper is built, countless old buildings are inevitably torn down. It is this thick layer of dust, accumulated over tens of hundreds of years, that made today's Londinium.
When you inherit these lands, not only will you inherit the extravagant furs you see on the outside. You must also accept the scars that lie underneath.
It is extraordinarily difficult to build a new house among these old ones.
Your eyes need to be able to see through the flesh and into the bones to find the place with the firmest foundation that can support the entire city.
This will be your starting point.
Vina, it is when you forget everything that you must inherit that you will truly become a proper successor.
Siege, please think this through again. Follow my advice.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: We must leave this place, this dark underground cavern at once.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Only timid metal crabs and insects hide underground. I can't stand hiding down here while our enemies are wreaking havoc above our heads.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: You know, the way you talk is really getting on my nerves...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: How could you call any of them spineless when every one of them stands up against the Sarkaz? If they were actually the cowards you make them out to be, they would've gone working for the Sarkaz long ago!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Don't get the wrong idea. I'm not trying to assign blame, but... there is only so much they can do.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: What do you mean, there is only so much they can do? Remember who it was that saved you when you made it out of Londinium, half-dead? How come you didn't say there was only so much we could do?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I don't want to argue with you.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I'm not arguing with you either, but I don't want to hear your cranky little mouth either.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Morgan and I told you when you first ran into us a year ago or so. If you wanted to join the Glasgow family, you'd have to rid yourself of your shitty aristocratic attitude.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Let me say a word on her behalf. Dagda's working very hard too. She's changed quite a bit.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: At a glance, no one could tell that she used to be a knight-noble.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Right, I learned a lot... from all of you. I'm sure you know that I've long thought of myself as a part of Glasgow.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: But now we're back in Londinium, I just can't help but be aware that I'm also a Knight of the Tower.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Don't you think that anything has changed just because we're back in Londinium.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Do you know how many eyes are on Vina? We've never been safe. No, it's exactly because we're back now that we're especially in danger.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I agree with you on that.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: And it's out of safety considerations that I think we should leave these militants we don't know the first thing about.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Dagda, you mean you're worried the resistance could act against Vina?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Their membership is too much of a mixed bag... What if some of them don't actually mean well?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Where do you think we should go, then?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: As far as I know, there are still some in the city that we can count on. My mother's friends.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I couldn't contact them before the Knights of the Tower fell, but the way I see it... now might be a good time.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: You mean... You want us to turn to the nobles?!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Who do you think murdered Vina's dad and forced her to hide out on the streets for years?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Who do you think... hunted us down and chased us out of Londinium? We don't even know if Baird and the rest of the gang are still alive!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: The nobles weren't of one mind back then... but after the Sarkaz came...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Hah... you think the Sarkaz are our only enemy?!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Listen up, my lady! You want to hand Vina over to those dirty lords? Over my dead body!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hannah!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: What are you doing, shouting like that? Do you want everyone to know who Vina is?!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Both of you, calm down. Fighting can't solve everything, especially at a crucial moment like this!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Until you've really thought through the consequences of your bickering, you'd better shut your mouths.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: What do you want Vina to...?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: It doesn't matter.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Vina? W-What do you have in mind?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I think Dagda's worries are reasonable. We followed Amiya and the Doctor here, but... in the end, our objective isn't the same as theirs.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: All they have to do is stop the Sarkaz in the city, and that's exactly what the resistance has been trying to do.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: But we...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: What do you think our objective is?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Morgan, Indra.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Why did you recognize me as your leader, back then?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Because Glasgow needed to survive in Londinium.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: We were still kids, and we made a lot of enemies. A lot of street punks had their eyes on us, and there were even a couple bad cops who always gave us trouble...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Vina, you're so much more incredible than the rest of us.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You're the one who taught me that a good boss doesn't just fight. Not only did you lead us out of trouble, you recruited so many faces into the gang, you made Glasgow stronger.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: That's why I'm confident you're a good boss, and that you'll be a good leader in the future.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Very good. Looks like we haven't forgotten our convictions.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Have you heard what the resistance commander said?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: They'll save Londinium, but before that, they'll save their brothers and sisters in arms.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Who's to say our objectives are different?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: My hammer was forged to serve this city... to serve Victoria. If my strength can save even just one Victorian, then I have no reason to leave the fight.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Dagda.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Sorry... I won't bring that up again.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: No, I just wanted to say you aren't in the wrong.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: If you have your own mission to accomplish, you needn't follow my every word.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You are a fine knight, but I'm not the one who knighted you.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'm not the lord you were born to serve. No... You should find the one you actually want to serve instead of being bound by your bloodline's oath. You're free, and you always have been.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Siege?!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Vina, that's a little...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: It's not like Dagda was...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Enough. You heard me well.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Dagda, I await your answer.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Understood, Siege.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Commander Clovisia, have you thought about our cooperation proposal?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya... May I call you Amiya? Please call me Clovisia.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Ah... Of course, Clovisia.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr.{@nickname} and you have more than sufficiently explained what your purpose here is. If I'm understanding you correctly, Rhodes Island is a pharmaceutical company that focuses on solving Infected issues?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: To that end, your company has worked with cities and even countries... I also know that most Sarkaz are infected.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: But... I just wanted to make sure about this. Did you come to Londinium with this objective too?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Or is it part of Rhodes Island's business to solve the Sarkaz question as well?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: The Sarkaz are not a question.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Clovisia, the way we see it, the real issue at hand is the war between the Sarkaz and the Victorians.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This war has already seen more than enough bloodshed on both the Victorian and Sarkaz sides...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If the war escalates further, what happens then? How many countries will be dragged into it? How many people?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We can't allow that to happen.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, your ideals... are noble. You are Infected, and you want to fight for the Infected. I can understand that... but what do you have to do with the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: I... I inherited my ideals from a Sarkaz. She was a Sarkaz, but she loved me, a Cautus, and she loved everyone.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And Rhodes Island... Rhodes Island was born from her feelings.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island fights for the Infected, the Sarkaz, and all those who are oppressed because we know very well that, in war, they are always neglected by those cruel men who stand at the top.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It doesn't matter how many of arrogant men in positions of power we have to deal with. Our focus will always be those who truly need our help.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The cruel men who stand at the top... eh?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: I see. I can empathize with how you feel, and I very much respect Rhodes Island's ideals.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: However... I hope you can understand that the Self-Salvation Corps is not the same as Rhodes Island. Our people come from different backgrounds and have different ideals. And even so, we are all fighting for the same goal.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: —We want to take back Londinium.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: If we can't be sure that Rhodes Island will always be on our side, even if you could persuade me, I wouldn't be able to persuade my men.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}... Do I have your word?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.options: You don't need my word.;What you need is our deeds.

attributes.content: Right, I admit. You've seen for yourself that the Self-Salvation Corps is low on manpower. We can't spare anyone to your cause.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Rhodes Island will not be a burden to the Self-Salvation Corps.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, you're mistaken, Amiya. Most of us aren't worried about your strength. It might actually be the opposite, even.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Your mission is far too ambitious. Besides, you saw it yourself. The Self-Salvation Corps hides in the gaps and crevices of the city just to make it from one battle to the next.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: If what you actually want is a larger battlefield, and it just so happens that the battlefield is Londinium—
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.options: You think we can defeat the Sarkaz occupying the city alone?;Only those on the same starting line have the right to vie for control.

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, I'm surprised you are so honest.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: You are admitting to me that although you don't currently have what it takes to face the Sarkaz—
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: When the time is right, Rhodes Island's objective is to depose the tyrannical Regent?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.options: Our objective is much more concrete.;You think we aim to seize Central Londinium.;No harm in supporting an armed group ready to cooperate.

attributes.content: Doctor... *Cough*...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (That's not what we said before we came...)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Politicians see nothing but bargaining chips.;Merchants smell nothing but profit.
And generals want nothing but power.

attributes.content: This isn't how we usually earn the trust of our collaborators...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No... You're right. Just like how even though we always seek to end wars, we have never been able to avoid one.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Clovisia, our objective is clear. Just like the Self-Salvation Corps, Rhodes Island will fight for the day we successfully stop the Sarkaz Regent.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Rhodes Island will provide you medical resources.;Closure's working with your engineers already.;We have other means to show our sincerity.
We will show you Rhodes Island's might in the next fight.
So, Commander Clovisia, is that to your satisfaction?

attributes.content: ......Dr. {@nickname}... you and Amiya are excellent partners.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: It seems Feist is right. You're the helpers we've been looking for.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: What did Mr. Feist...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He spoke on your behalf in front of me and all the captains.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: What about that problem earlier, then?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He's still young. Even though he has the courage to stand up and speak, he isn't ready to take responsibility for the outcome. This burden is for me to shoulder.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: But you're young too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Haha, but I'm their commander. In my position, you would do the same too, wouldn't you?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Yes... Right, I know you just wanted us to explain our position one more time.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I hope you don't mind.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: O-Of course I don't mind! Both the Doctor and I are happy... to have found an excellent partner.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: You're an excellent commander, Clovisia.;The Self-Salvation Corps is impressive.;Thanks, Feist.

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, Feist told me about you, but you're still... not what I expected.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: When the reconnaissance team comes back, let us plan out this operation together.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: This will be a rescue mission. I believe your Operators are very experienced in such missions?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: I look forward to working with Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Rockrock, my men just got some news from Lady Golding.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Tell our contact we'll be there right away.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Phew... It's a good thing we got in contact with the Messenger. If it wasn't for her, I'm not sure we would've been able to locate the prison.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Yeah, I only hope this trip will be fruitful.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Right, what's going on with you and Feist.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Nothing.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I heard you squabbling. Ever since we formed a team together, the two of you always worked together so well, like hand in glove. I've never seen you fight like that.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: We have differing opinions, that's all.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: How do you know you aren't of one mind? You should've talked to him about the past long ago. He may always be banging away at his devices, but he'll listen to you.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Is this why you came along? I didn't know you liked mending relationships as much as welding things together.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Haha, it's all the same to me. You're both good soldiers, and I've always thought of you as siblings.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Watch your nine!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Phew, that was close... How come there are so many mercenaries out on the streets?
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: The Sarkaz are trying to catch us. Rock-5...
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Hm... Rock-5 sees our contact. In the bakery up ahead. Go. I'll keep an eye on the mercenaries.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Hey, Bill, could you get this part over to Harmo? I think he could use it when he reinforces his grain lorry.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Uh... alright.
Hand me the wrench.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Franck's shield, too. I put on a new coat of paint on the surface. That should make it fireproof, but remind him that it's going to crack if he lets it get too hot for too long!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Hm... The technology behind this paint is obsolete.
Why don't you try out Raythean's latest formula? It's kinda expensive, but Engineering came up with a cheap generic version. If you're interested, I can give you a discount.
Huh?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Hot hot hot!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Whoa, you got a hole in your thermal gloves? Are you an engineer for real? Hands are like the most important thing to an engineer!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Gloves are a luxury! I can't grab new ones just because I want to!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Besides, how was I supposed to know you were here? My hands are usually a lot stabler.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Your eyes don't look so good to me either. That's like one of the ten must-have qualities of an engineer.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: *Cough*, Old Bill's to blame for this...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Where did he go? Usually he's the only one to stand next to me.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Oh, when I got here, I saw a group following your lieutenant somewhere.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Didn't he promise to come help me out?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You worried about them?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Rockrock left in a hurry. I didn't even have the time to check out Rock-5.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I'm worried that brawl this morning could've damaged the drones somehow...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Hmm... If you're worried about other stuff, there's no way you'll pop out anything too sturdy.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: This is all we can do, and it's only by doing it well that things will be safer for our friends aboveground, right?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Haha... I didn't expect Rhodes Island's engineer to be so good at comforting people.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Huh? What are you even talking about? I'll have you know I'm Rhodes Island's ace psychological consultant. Even Kal'tsit... uh, a real mean boss of mine comes to me and opens up to destress!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: So, hurry up and hand me the wrench.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Let's get working already! What, you want me to crack a few more jokes to lift your spirits?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: There's gonna be some real intense battles soon. Us Engineering Operators are like the backbone of the backbone. There's no time for all that moping!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Ha... haha... Alright, let's get working.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Right, show me that drone... Rock-17. It's lacking a flight stability module. I took one off my broken babies.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Huh? You sure about that? Are there any patents or anything?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Shh, quiet! I did it behind Dr.{@nickname}'s back!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* *cough*.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Now that you know how lucky you are, what are you standing there for? Get me my wrench!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: W-What did you say...? You saw Lady Golding? What did she say?
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Understood... We need to send word about this to the commander right now!
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Nngh—! H-Hostiles! They found us! Rockrock, retreat!
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Find the captain! Rebels spotted on Euston Road!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Seize them!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Run!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: What's this buzzing thing...? A drone? I get it. You were at the port this morning!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Rock-5—! What's the matter? Did we miss?!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Is it because we didn't calibrate it...? We didn't spot the enemies just now, either... Nngh!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Feline, don't you think that's going to work. It might've worked on the Royal Court's squaddies, but it won't work on us.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Rockrock, is your drone dead?!
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: It's okay... Even without it, I can still fight.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Tsk... I didn't expect to take damage from you. Looks like your Arts are no less impressive than your courage.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I'll put in a word for you with my captain and let you die here. You don't have to go to the factory anymore. Saves you a painful death.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Ugh––!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Rockrock, get going! I'll hold it here!
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: No, we'll go together!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: You need to get Lady Golding's message back...! The Commander must know... She must know... that the Messenger...
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: This message... is very important!
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Bill!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I believe... in the commander... and I believe in you and Feist.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Listen to me. Stop fighting. We're... all a family. Back then... we were only able to escape because your dad... your dad stood in the Sarkaz's way too.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Go!
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: *Cough*... *cough*! What's with the thick smoke... Did he have a grenade?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: How dare you hurt my men! You aren't getting out of this alive!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Captain?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Take him back, and lock him away with the other rebels.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Captain, this guy tried to blow us up and got himself caught in the blast. He won't live much longer.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: He doesn't have to live much longer.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Very well. it's the general's orders, right? Should we go after the rest of them?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Do it.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Don't hold out too much hope, though.
attributes.name: Hoederer
